questions.question_text: An engineer is configuring ACI Multi-Pod between two data centers and must plan the physical cabling in the primary data center. How must the Cisco ACI Multi-Pod topology be connected?

discussion.content:
back-to-back spine connection without IPN is also possible 

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/dcn/aci/apic/kb/cisco-multipod-b2b.html#Cisco_Concept.dita_e864c2ca-9570-45cd-86a7-fc893c35b835

Selected Answer: C
C. Connect spine switch 201 and 202 in pod 1 to ports on a device that is providing IP connectivity between pods.

and this device is IPN router, interpod network

choices.C: Connect spine switch 201 and 202 in pod 1 to ports on a device that is providing IP connectivity between pods.
choices.D: Connect leaf switch 101 and 102 in pod 1 to ports on a device that is providing IP connectivity between pods.
choices.B: Connect leaf switch 101 and 102 in pod 1 directly to leaf switch 101 and 102 in pod 2.
choices.A: Connect spine switch 201 and 202 in pod 1 directly to spine switch 201 and 202 in pod 2.
One-to-one mapping between EPGs and bridge domains is enforced.
choices.B: A bridge domain has only one subnet.
choices.D: It simplifies gradual migration from a traditional network.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. EPGs represent different application tiers.

questions.question_text: What is a characteristic of application-centric design in Cisco ACI?

choices.D: Set policy control enforcement to Unenforced
choices.E: Enable the Preferred Group option on EPGs 1 to 50.
choices.B: Create a standard contract between EPG 51 and EPG 10.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BE
"Preferred Group (PG) feature allows you to specify a set of EPGs that are part of the same VRF to allow
full communication between them with no need for contracts to be created."

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/dcn/mso/3x/configuration/cisco-aci-multi-site-configuration-guide-301/aci-multi-site-use-case-preferred-group.pdf

questions.question_text:
A Cisco ACI fabric is configured with these settings:

• A single VRF exists that contains 100 EPGs.
• EPGs 1 to 50 must be permitted to communicate.
• EPGs 51 to 100 must NOT be allowed to communicate with EPGs 1 to 50.
• EPG 51 must be allowed to communicate with EPG 10

Which two actions must be taken to accomplish these requirements? (Choose two.)
An engineer configures Cisco ACI Multi-Site and must specify the control plane TEP IP for spines. Which statement describes control plane TEP IP in this situation?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Overlay Multicast TEP (O-MTEP): This common anycast address is shared by all the spine nodes in the same site and is used to perform head-end replication for BUM traffic. BUM traffic is sourced from the O-UTEP address defined on the local spine nodes and destined for the O-MTEP of remote sites to which the given bridge domain is being stretched.

Selected Answer: A
A. The unique IP address is defined on each spine node that belongs to a fabric and is used to establish MP-BGP EVPN and VPNv4 adjacencies with the spine nodes in remote sites.

choices.A: The unique IP address is defined on each spine node that belongs to a fabric and is used to establish MP-BGP EVPN and VPNv4 adjacencies with the spine nodes in remote sites.
choices.C: The common anycast address is shared by all the spine nodes in the same site and is used to perform headend replication for BUM traffic.
choices.D: The common anycast address is shared by all the spine nodes at the same site and is used to source and receive unicast VXLAN data plane traffic.
choices.B: The unique IP address is defined on each spine node that belongs to a fabric and is used to establish VXLAN adjacencies with the spine nodes in remote sites.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D. Enable GARP EP Move Detection.
use Gratuitous ARP mechanism to update IP/MAC when other NIC is offline/down
so its not necessarily about endpoint itself, but rather about MAC Moves and changes

choices.B: Set L2 Unknown Unicast to Proxy.

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. Server S1 is connected to Cisco ACI using two NIC interfaces. NIC1 is an active interface and NIC2 is a standby interface. NIC2 uses its MAC address to send traffic to the Cisco ACI fabric when NIC1 is offline. The requirement is to update the IP address to use the MAC address of NIC2. Which action accomplishes this goal?
